Sentencas: The increasing demand for green hydrogen and power production necessitates the development of novel and upgraded power generation technologies.
Titulo: Comparative study on thermodynamic analysis of solid oxide fuel cells supplied with methanol or ammonia

Sentencas: The solid oxide fuel cell combined heat and power (SOFC-CHP) system is a promising solution due to its high efficiency, clean operation, and fuel flexibility.
Titulo: Comparative study on thermodynamic analysis of solid oxide fuel cells supplied with methanol or ammonia

Sentencas: In practical terms, SOFCs can operate using a variety of fuels such as alcoholic fuel, hydrogen, ammonia, etc.
Titulo: Comparative study on thermodynamic analysis of solid oxide fuel cells supplied with methanol or ammonia

Sentencas: Recently, methanol and ammonia have become noteworthy alternative fuel options as it possesses advantages such as low transportation cost and high hydrogen storage capacity.
Titulo: Comparative study on thermodynamic analysis of solid oxide fuel cells supplied with methanol or ammonia

Sentencas: In this paper, we have established two SOFC-CHP models fueled by methanol or ammonia integrated with the steam Rankine cycle.
Titulo: Comparative study on thermodynamic analysis of solid oxide fuel cells supplied with methanol or ammonia

Sentencas: A comprehensive thermodynamic model is proposed for energy and exergy analyses.
Titulo: Comparative study on thermodynamic analysis of solid oxide fuel cells supplied with methanol or ammonia

Sentencas: Sensitivity analysis is performed to study the system's characteristics.
Titulo: Comparative study on thermodynamic analysis of solid oxide fuel cells supplied with methanol or ammonia

Sentencas: The results show that the SOFC-CHP system fueled by ammonia exhibits superior performance, the maximum electrical power, efficiency, and exergy efficiency is 430W, 7% and 10% greater than the methanol fueled system.
Titulo: Comparative study on thermodynamic analysis of solid oxide fuel cells supplied with methanol or ammonia

Sentencas: The operating temperature is about 30K higher in methanol supplied system.
Titulo: Comparative study on thermodynamic analysis of solid oxide fuel cells supplied with methanol or ammonia

Sentencas: The largest thermal power difference can reach 0.65 kW.
Titulo: Comparative study on thermodynamic analysis of solid oxide fuel cells supplied with methanol or ammonia

Sentencas: Overall, the ammonia fueled SOFC-CHP system shows greater potential than that fueled by methanol.
Titulo: Comparative study on thermodynamic analysis of solid oxide fuel cells supplied with methanol or ammonia
